'''...And Thanks for All the Fish!''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete the {{Quest|Feeling Like Fish Today!}}.

==Trivia==
* The name of this achievement is likely a reference to ''{{w|So Long, and Thanks for All the Fish}}'' from the {{w|Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy}} book series.
